listing.letting_fees:
Should you wish to proceed with a tenancy through M & M Property, the following fees/charges will apply in addition to the rent agreed:-

There is a holding fee payable to secure a property until the agreed move-in date. This fee is usually equivalent to one weeks’ rent and acts as part payment towards your first months’ rent. It is only refundable if on our part or the landlord's part, the tenancy cannot proceed.

There is an administration fee equivalent to the sum of the holding fee, payable by the Tenant/s should you cancel a proposed tenancy or fail to move in without prior agreement, by the agreed move-in date.

There is an administration fee of £100.00 + vat per person payable for processing a tenancy through M & M Property.There is usually a Check-out fee payable by the tenant/s for the final "schedule of condition" of the property. The Check-Out fee is estimated in advance and varies according to the size and contents of the property. Prices range approximately between £85.00 and £200.00 per property and is payable at the start of the tenancy.

There is a security Deposit payable, equivalent to the sum of either one months’ rent or six weeks rent or sometimes more depending on the property and/or your personal circumstances.
listing.description: M&M are pleased to offer this stunning four bedroom property, split over two floors. A refurbished period conversion, finished to a high standard with stylish exposed brickwork and exquisite design throughout, this home has the typical traits of high ceilings and big sash windows, making it very bright and airy. The generous front to back open plan living space leads out on to the private garden at the rear. There are two generously sized bedrooms, and two further doubles, modern three piece family bathroom, with shower over the bath and an additional guest WC. A perfect option for a family home or an option for professional sharers that want easy access to the city with a 12 minute train journey from the nearby Clapton station, only a 9 minute walk from the property. Other transport links connect via bus routes to The City, West End and Highbury and Islington, with the luxury of a night bus regularly running from Tottenham Court Road. Storage is not a problem here as there are a number of cupboards and built in wardrobes throughout the house. Further benefiting from wood floors, gas central heating and double glazing.Definitely a must see.Furnishings: UnfurnishedAvailable: NowTo view, call M&M Property on Fees Apply)

listing.description: Key features:City View ApartmentsBrand New ApartmentOne Double Bedroom Generous BalconyTastefully Furnished24 Concierge Facilities Gymnasium/SpaZone 2Fantastic LocationFull description:This stunning brand new third floor spacious apartment situated within City View Apartments comprises entrance hall with storage cupboard, expansive reception room with solid wood flooring throughout and wall to wall floor to ceiling glass doors leading to generous private balcony offering pleasant views, semi open plan state of the art fully equipped fitted kitchen with stone work surfaces and integrated appliances, double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and stylish contemporary double walk in shower suite. Residents benefits include 24 hour five star concierge facilities, residents gym/spa and use of enviable boating reservoir adjacent to the developments. City View Apartments is situated moments from great local transport links into Islington, The City and London capital wide

listing.description: M&M Property are pleased to present this spacious two bedroom garden flat located in close proximity to Rectory Road station offering good access to the City and the West End. The property offers two double bedrooms, family bathroom, a semi open plan reception that leads on to the large private garden. Gas central heating, double glazing and wood floors throughout. listing.description: M&M Property are pleased to present this one bedroom flat arranged over the first floor of a period property in the popular Dalston region. With a spacious reception room with semi open plan kitchen, three piece bathroom with shower over the bath and double bedrooms overlooking the peaceful gardens at the rear. The property is located between the Dalston Kingsland, Hackney Central and Hackney Downs, Overground Stations. Offering easy access in to The City. With the local amenities and buzz of the Kingsland High Street within easy reach, this property perfectly located for professional sharers or couples that want the East London Lifestyle.Available 21st Sept 2015Furnishings: UnfurnishedTo view, call M&M Property on

listing.description: We are pleased to offer for rent this newly built on bedroom apartment situated on the forth floor.  The property comprises of a bright and spacious lounge with wooden floor and patio doors leading out onto the balcony.  Modern open plan fitted kitchen furnished with integrated white goods.  Good size double bedroom with built in double wardrobe.  Luxury fitted bathroom suite with power shower over bath.  Video security entry system and under floor heating.  Residents will benefit from a concierge service and use of the beautifully maintained communal gardens, and use of the on site gym and spa which is due to complete in 2016.  The development is situated a short distance from both Manor House tube station and Finsbury Park station.
listing.short_description: We are pleased to offer for rent this newly built on bedroom apartment situated on the forth floor.  The property comprises of a bright and spacious lounge with wooden floor and patio doors leading out onto the balcony.  Modern open plan fitted kitchen furnished with integrated white goods.  Good size double bedroom with built in double wardrobe.  Luxury fitted bathroom suite with power shower over bath.  Video security entry system and under floor heating.  Residents will benefit from a concierge service and use of the beautifully maintained communal gardens, and use of the on site gym and spa which is due to complete in 2016.  The development is situated a short distance from both Manor House tube station and Finsbury Park station.

listing.displayable_address: Mare Street, Hackney / Broadway Market E8
listing.description: Recently built contemporary 1 bedroom flat located on Hackney's historic Mare street and close to the ever popular and trendy Broadway Market. This flat is one of seven in a boutique development with a high quality contemporary finish throughout. The property is offered with hardwood floors, fully fitted and modern kitchen, modern and stylish bathroom, and excellent natural light.Mare Street is renowned for its diverse shops and amenities. Both Victoria Park and London Fields are within easy walking distance offering access to wide open spaces. The development has excellent transport links: Located less than 5 minutes walk to Cambridge Heath station and 10 minutes walk to Bethnal Green tube. Further along, the nearby London Fields British rail station provides overground service.Please note that there are agency fees that apply if you wish to rent this property.
listing.short_description: Recently built, contemporary 1 bed flat located close to the ever popular Broadway Market.

Situated on the second floor, it has a double bedroom, open plan kitchen living room and modern shower cubicle. The communal areas are kept clean and it is situated close to all local amenities. 3 minute Walk to Finsbury Park Underground/Over ground stations.
